Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.nexmo.sdk.verify.client.VerifyClient.getVerifiedUser()
    Use VerifyClient.getVerifiedUser(String, String) method instead and supply the user's phone number and country code. Verify the user of the current handset, with the handset SIM details.

    Verification with no supplied phone number along with country code is not permitted for SIM less handsets.

    In this case, the end user does not need to enter their own phone number, as they will be automatically read from the SIM card.

    Note: This method will only succeed if the current handset does contain a SIM card. Otherwise, please call VerifyClient.getVerifiedUser(String, String) with values provided by the user.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.nexmo.sdk.verify.event.VerifyError.PROVIDED_NUMBER_NOT_ACCEPTED
    Provided number does not match the SIM phone number. Please use the VerifyClient.getVerifiedUser(String, String) method without params for the verification to be initiated.
